rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course type {10, 20, 41, 50}
Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {AFW1002, BTS1201, BTW1201} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}

description: This unit provides an introduction to the principles and practices of taxation in South Africa. Topics covered include: gross income; special inclusions; exempt income; allowable deductions; special deductions; capital allowances; capital gains tax; value added tax (VAT); and South African tax law. This unit is a requirement for students wanting to register as a Chartered Accountant with the South African Institute of Chartered Accountants (SAICA).
